jobs.job_description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced React/Node.js Developer to join our development team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. This role requires a highly skilled individual with a strong background in front-end and back-end development, as well as a passion for creating efficient and scalable applications and websites with our website development services .
### React/Node.js Developer Responsibilities:
#### Application Developments:
- Design and develop web applications using React and Node.js.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
#### Collaboration:
- Work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to deliver high-quality products.
- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
- Collaborate with the back-end team to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
#### Testing and Debugging:
- Develop and execute unit tests to ensure the quality and functionality of the code.
- Identify and troubleshoot issues and bugs in the application.
- Perform debugging and performance tuning to improve application performance.
#### Continuous Improvement:
- Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
- Continuously improve development processes and workflows.
- Participate in team meetings and contribute to the planning and execution of projects.
#### React/Node.js Developer Requirements:
- Strong experience with React and Node.js.
- Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- Experience with front-end build tools and libraries (e.g., Webpack, Babel).
- Knowledge of RESTful APIs and web services.
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
- Strong understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Good communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members.
#### Preferred Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- Experience with other front-end frameworks and libraries (e.g., Angular, Vue.js).
- Knowledge of database technologies (e.g., MongoDB, MySQL).
- Familiarity with cloud platforms and services (e.g., AWS, Azure).
- Understanding of Agile development methodologies.
#### Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
- Health and wellness benefits.
- Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
If you are a driven and enthusiastic individual with a passion for business development, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and join our team!
agent_recommendation_notes: Perfect match for user's requirements - includes both React and Node.js technologies
Full-stack development role aligns with user's preference for full-stack JS developer positions
Entry to mid-level friendly - doesn't specify excessive experience requirements
Modern tech stack with React, Node.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Includes remote work possibilities and professional development opportunities

jobs.job_description:
We are s looking for a Node.js Developer who will take ownership of backend development and API creation for healthcare applications. You will work on end-to-end SDLC activities, from analyzing requirements to deployment and maintenance, while directly collaborating with international clients.

**Key Responsibilities**

● Develop backend services and RESTful APIs using Node.js

● Analyze requirements and provide technical recommendations

● Collaborate with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration

● Write efficient database queries (SQL/NoSQL)

● Conduct unit testing and resolve defects ● Communicate directly with clients and participate in daily scrums

● Adhere to coding standards and development best practices

**Performance Indicators**

● Timely and high-quality delivery of backend features

● Low defect rates and fast resolution turnaround

● Positive feedback from client collaboration and support

● Effective communication during agile ceremonies

● Active participation in continuous improvement and learning initiatives

**Qualifications**

● 1+ year of experience in application development

● 6–12 months of hands-on experience with Node.js and databases (SQL/NoSQL)

● Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field

● Good written and spoken English communication skills

● Willingness to learn new technologies and take part in end-to-end SDLC

● Available for mid-shift and modified night shifts as needed

**Nice to Have:**

● Experience with AWS/Azure

● Familiarity with Angular, .NET, or Java

● Team leadership or mentoring experience

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:

- Work from home

Experience:

- Node.js: 1 year (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote
agent_recommendation_notes: Strong match for Node.js developer role with 1+ year experience requirement
Remote work option available which matches user's preference
Healthcare domain provides stable industry experience
Includes both SQL and NoSQL database experience
Requires night shift availability which may not suit all candidates

jobs.job_description:
Exciting opportunity for Software Developers to enhance their careers while learning Chinese for free in Wenzhou, China. This program offers a one-year job placement after completion. Ideal candidates are those with at least two years of work experience and a degree. Classes are held every Friday and Saturday, providing a unique chance to gain valuable skills and secure a high-paying job abroad.

Mid career · 2-6 Years of Experience
